title: Velká kniha minerálů
content:
Velká kniha minerálů

The book discusses minerals used in alchemy, including sulfur, Ginatz's Acid, wine stone, Naezan salts, Calcium Equum, phosphorus, powdered pearl, pyrite, Optima Mater, the Fifth Essence, Ducal Water, Albar's Crystals, Lunar Shards and quicksilver solution. The alchemical substances present in these ingredients are also discussed.

The book provides information on substances found in all minerals which can be purchased from alchemists.

Zápisy do Deníku

Ingredience:

Albarovy krystaly
Calcium equum
Fosfor
Ginatská kyselina
Knížecí voda
Pátá esence
Měsíční úlomky
Naezanské soli
Optima mater
Prášková perla
Pyrit
Roztok rtuti
Síra
Vinný kámen
Cena
